A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: It amazes me the same folks that poo poo Batman vs. Superman and Warcraft\, think this and the Force Awakens are great. B vs S was far superior and even Warcraft was slightly better than this one. The characters are horibble\, Rey is flat\, Hux and Snoke are jokes\, and Kylo's emo whining makes Anakin look mature and heroic. The comedy is awkward and misplaced in scenes that should be intense. This Luke Skywalker is terrible and Superwoman Leia is ridiculous. Disney should have let the Force Sleep...
